product_name: Pieps Tour Pro 34 JetForce Avalanche Airbag Pack
long_description: Designed for all-day ski tours and hut trips, the Tour Pro 34 carries all the tools of the trade for backcountry enthusiasts and guides, and features a JetForce fan-inflated airbag for added safety.
short_description: Designed for all-day ski tours and hut trips, the Tour Pro 34 carries all the tools of the trade for backcountry enthusiasts and guides, and features a JetForce fan-inflated airbag for added safety.
